admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF023485-USDOE-ALTERNATIVE ENERGY ACTIVITIES,TF022865-ALTERNATIVE ENERGY POLICY &
            PROJECT DEV.

abstracts.cdata!:
The project includes the following
            components: (a) a provincial electrification component,
            which includes the construction of several overhead
            river-crossing lines to interconnect disaggregated local
            networks with the Thai grid and extension of networks in six
            provinces of the country's central and southern
            regions; (b) a system efficiency component, which includes
            action programs for the Electricite du Laos (EdL) to reduce
            system losses, improve billing and collections, and reduce
            arrears from government agencies; and equipment and
            materials to strengthen EdL's operation and maintenance
            services, particularly at its provincial subsidiaries; (c)
            an institutional development component that includes
            equipment, materials and services, and needed technical
            assistance for upgrading the skills of EdL's staff and
            its training facilities; and (d) a future project
            development component that includes a feasibility study for
            the installation of additional capacity and the Nam Ngum
            hydro station.
